parameters.name: EncryptedInstance
parameters.description: 实例是否开通数据存储加密功能

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ApsaraMQ for RabbitMQ instance.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The instance edition. Valid values for subscription instances:

*   professional: Professional Edition
*   enterprise: Enterprise Edition
*   vip: Enterprise Platinum Edition.

If your instance is a pay-as-you-go instance, you do not need to configure this parameter.

parameters.name: MaxConnections
parameters.description: The maximum number of connections that can be created on the instance.

parameters.name: MaxEipTps
parameters.description: The peak TPS for accessing the instance over the Internet.

parameters.name: MaxPrivateTps
parameters.description: The peak transactions per second (TPS) for accessing the instance in a virtual private cloud (VPC).

parameters.name: ModifyType
parameters.description:
The type of the configuration change. Valid values:

*   UPGRADE
*   DOWNGRADE

parameters.name: QueueCapacity
parameters.description: The maximum number of queues that can be created on the instance.

parameters.name: ServerlessChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the serverless instance. Valid values:

*   onDemand: You are charged based on your actual usage.

parameters.name: StorageSize
parameters.description: The size of the storage space that can be used to store messages.

parameters.name: SupportEip
parameters.description: Specifies whether elastic IP addresses (EIPs) are supported.

parameters.name: SupportTracing
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the message trace feature.

parameters.name: TracingStorageTime
parameters.description:
The retention period of message traces.

Valid values:

*   3
*   7
*   15
